page.title: 15A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: MY DAY STARTS AT 8 O'CLOCK WHEN MY ALARM CLOCK WAKES ME UP. I GET DRESSED IN MY SCHOOL UNIFORM OF BLOUSE, SKIRT AND JUMPER. THE MAIN COLOUR IS NAVY BLUE BUT WE CAN WEAR GREY AS WELL. I GO DOWNSTAIRS AND HAVE A BOWL OF CEREAL AND A CUP OF TEA THEN I BRUSH MY TEETH AND WASH MY FACE. MY MUM PUTS MY HAIR IN A PONYTAIL THEN I GET ALL MY THINGS TOGETHER AND GO TO SCHOOL. SCHOOL IS FROM 9.15a.m. UNTIL 3.15p.m. WITH A 15 MINUTE BREAK DURING THE MORNING AND AN HOUR FOR LUNCH AT 12.15p.m. I TAKE SANDWICHES FOR LUNCH BUT SOME OF MY FRIENDS HAVE A SCHOOL DINNER. AFTER SCHOOL I GO HOME AND WATCH TELEVISION UNTIL 6p.m.WHEN I HAVE MY TEA OF PERHAPS SAUSAGES AND JACKET POTATOES. AFTER TEA I PLAY OUTSIDE UNTIL IT GETS DARK THEN I GO INDOORS AND WATCH TELEVISION UNTIL 8.45p.m. WHEN I GO TO BED.
